refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A GtkPrintSettings object represents the settings of a print dialog in a system-independent way. The main use for this object is that once you've printed you can get a settings object that represents the settings the user chose, and the next time you print you can pass that object in so that the user doesn't have to re-set all his settings.

Its also possible to enumerate the settings so that you can easily save the settings for the next time your app runs, or even store them in a document. The predefined keys try to use shared values as much as possible so that moving such a document between systems still works.
Printing support was added in GTK+ 2.10.

refsect2.title: GtkPrintSettingsFunc ()

listitem.simpara: a newly allocated copy of other

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_has_key ()
refsect2.para: Returns TRUE, if a value is associated with key.

listitem.simpara: TRUE, if key has a value

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_get ()
refsect2.para: Looks up the string value associated with key.

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_set ()
gtk_print_settings_unset ()
refsect2.para: Removes any value associated with key. This has the same effect as setting the value to NULL.

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_foreach ()
refsect2.para: Calls func for each key-value pair of settings.

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_get_bool ()
refsect2.para: Returns the boolean represented by the value that is associated with key.
The string "true" represents TRUE, any other string FALSE.

listitem.simpara: TRUE, if key maps to a true value.

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_set_bool ()
refsect2.para: Sets key to a boolean value.

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_get_double ()
refsect2.para: Returns the double value associated with key, or 0.

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_get_double_with_default ()
refsect2.para: Returns the floating point number represented by the value that is associated with key, or default_val if the value does not represent a floating point number.
Floating point numbers are parsed with g_ascii_strtod().

listitem.simpara: the floating point number associated with key

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_set_double ()
refsect2.para: Sets key to a double value.

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_get_length ()
refsect2.para: Returns the value associated with key, interpreted as a length. The returned value is converted to units.

listitem.simpara: the unit of the return value
the length value of key, converted to unit

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_set_length ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gtk_print_settings_set_length (GtkPrintSettings *settings, const gchar *key, gdouble value, GtkUnit unit);
refsect2.para: Associates a length in units of unit with key.

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_get_int ()
refsect2.para: Returns the integer value of key, or 0.

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_get_int_with_default ()
refsect2.programlisting: gint gtk_print_settings_get_int_with_default (GtkPrintSettings *settings, const gchar *key, gint def);
refsect2.para: Returns the value of key, interpreted as an integer, or the default value.

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_set_int ()
refsect2.para: Sets key to an integer value.

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_get_printer ()
refsect2.para: Convenience function to obtain the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PRINTER.

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_set_printer ()
refsect2.para: Convenience function to set GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PRINTER to printer.

refsect2.title: enum GtkPageOrientation
gtk_print_settings_get_orientation ()
refsect2.para: Get the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_ORIENTATION, converted to a GtkPageOrientation.

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_get_paper_size ()
refsect2.para: Gets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PAPER_FORMAT, converted to a GtkPaperSize.

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_set_paper_size ()
refsect2.para: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PAPER_FORMAT, GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PAPER_WIDTH and GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PAPER_HEIGHT.

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_get_paper_width ()
refsect2.para: Gets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PAPER_WIDTH, converted to unit.

listitem.simpara: the unit for the return value
the paper width, in units of unit

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_set_paper_width ()
gtk_print_settings_get_paper_height ()
refsect2.para: Gets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PAPER_HEIGHT, converted to unit.

listitem.simpara: the unit for the return value
the paper height, in units of unit

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_set_paper_height ()

listitem.simpara: whether to collate the printed pages
whether to reverse the order of the printed pages

refsect2.title: enum GtkPrintDuplex

listitem.simpara: whether to print the output in duplex.

refsect2.title: enum GtkPrintQuality

listitem.simpara: the number of copies to print
the number of pages per sheet
the number of pages per sheet

refsect2.title: enum GtkPrintPages
GtkPageRange

listitem.simpara: return location for the length of the returned array
an array of GtkPageRanges. Use g_free() to free the array when it is no longer needed.

refsect2.title: enum GtkPageSet

listitem.simpara: the set of pages to print

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_get_media_type ()
refsect2.para: The set of media types is defined in PWG 5101.1-2002 PWG.

refsect2.title: gtk_print_settings_set_media_type ()
refsect2.para: The set of media types is defined in PWG 5101.1-2002 PWG.

refsect2.title: GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_OUTPUT_FILE_FORMAT
refsect2.para: The key used by the "Print to file" printer to store the format of the output. The supported values are "PS" and "PDF".

refsect2.title: GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_OUTPUT_URI
refsect2.para: The key used by the "Print to file" printer to store the URI to which the output should be written. GTK+ itself supports only "file://" URIs.
